actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A joint resolution to provide for the establishment of the Elvis Presley National Historic Site.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to acquire by donation or purchase the Graceland Mansion and its grounds on Elvis Presley Boulevard, Memphis, Tennessee, for the establishment of an "Elvis Presley National Historic Site. Directs such site to be administered by the Department of the Interior.

titles.title: A joint resolution to provide for the establishment of the Elvis Presley National Historic Site.
